issues.economy: The UK Coalition is taking tough decisions to deal with Britain's debts after Labour maxed out on the nation's credit card to the brink of bankruptcy.
issues.governance: Russell George believes that the Assembly Government has let us down in Montgomeryshire and that Mid Wales has been ignored for too long by the Welsh Assembly Government.
issues.health: Russell with campaigners and Glyn Davies MP who presented a petition to Parliament to keep Maternity and Children's services at Shrewsbury Hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: Russell George is a local man who will be a dedicated Assembly Member and believes Montgomeryshire deserves better.

politicalExperience.role: local businessman, school governor, church youth worker, volunteer and Community Councillor

endorsements.endorsement: I will work closely together and I know he really fight the flag for Montgomeryshire and give it the representation it needs and deserves in the Assembly

images.caption: Russell with campaigners and Glyn Davies MP who presented a petition to Parliament to keep Maternity and Children's services at Shrewsbury Hospital.
